renderpass.name: Image

renderpass.code:
#define RES  iResolution.xy
#define iT   iTime
#define i0   iChannel0
#define i1   iChannel1
#define i1R  ( 1. / iChannelResolution[ 1 ].xy )
#define tx( c, p ) texture( c, p )   
void
    mainImage( out vec4 o, vec2 i ) {
        
        vec2
            j = i  / RES; 
        
            o = 
                i.y < 1.
                	? vec4( vec2( tx( i1, vec2( j.x, .25 ) ).r, tx( i1, vec2( j.x, .75 ) ).r ), 0, 1 )
                	: tx( i0, vec2( j.x, j.y - 1. / RES.y ) );
        
    }
renderpass.name: Buf A
